infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone to record audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to select images and videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to save images and videos.

plugins.photosPermission: TapUp needs access to your photos so you can upload them to your profile.
plugins.cameraPermission: TapUp needs access to your camera so you can take photos and upload them to your profile.
plugins.microphonePermission: TapUp needs access to your microphone so you can record audio and upload it to your profile.
